main event: A sighting of 9 cigar-shaped objects, white in color, moving slowly in the sky over Pacoima, California on April 8, 1957.
interesting points: The objects were observed for a 15-minute duration., The objects were moving at a slight climbing motion of 10-15 degrees per second., The sighting took place around 4:00 AM., The initial azimuth of the objects appeared to be approximately 70 degrees., The report concluded that the objects were likely aircraft or possibly astronomical phenomena.
witness description: no witnesses were confirmed as part of this single report
